title: Maghalie Rochette Continues Clean USCX sweep at Charm City Cross; Anton Ferdinande Wins Three-Up Sprint
content:
Rochette has distanced her rivals all series, while Vincent Baestaens held onto his overall lead with a pair of top-five finishes.

Read the full article at Maghalie Rochette Continues Clean USCX sweep at Charm City Cross; Anton Ferdinande Wins Three-Up Sprint on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
